description: Host of radio show "Lucky Channel". An idol currently appearing on TV and radio! At first sight, she looks like the cute type of character, but at 14 years old, she has 11 years of experience in the entertainment business, so she is also a veteran entertainer, who is strict about etiquette! She seems greatly displeased with Minoru Shiraishi, a newcomer recently experiencing a wave of success.
name: Kogami Akira
